pageProduct.name: Wanderlust Ashwagandha 90ml
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Traditionally used in Ayurvedic Medicine to calm nerves and as an adaptogen to help the body adapt to stress.

Wanderlust Ashwagandha is a consciously created plant active in a readily absorbed liquid herbal extract. Ashwagandha is traditionally used in Ayurvedic Medicine to calm nerves, relieve nervous tension and as an adaptogen to help the body adapt to stress.

Size: 90 mL

Warnings

Talk to an Ayurvedic practitioner / health professional if you are unsure if this medicine is right for you. If symptoms persist, talk to your health professional.

Ingredients

EACH 3.5 mL CONTAINS:
Withania somnifera (Ashwagandha) root ext. liquid 3.15 mL
Derived from dry-----3.15 g

Also contains glycerol and peppermint oil.
Contains 40.5% alcohol.

No added gluten, dairy, lactose, egg, artificial colours or artificial flavours.
Suitable for vegetarians and vegans.

You can expect a bitter taste which is typical of herbal extracts and all of their goodness.

Complemented with natural peppermint oil.

Directions

DIRECTIONS FOR USE - ADULT DOSAGE:
Using the measured dropper take 3.5 mL daily, or as directed by your healthcare practitioner. Drop directly onto the tongue or dilute in 30 mL of water or juice and consume immediately; Follow with a glass of water if necessary.

Shake well before use.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C in a cool, dry place away from direct heat and sunlight. Do not use if cap seal is missing or broken.
